metadata.title: CVE-2017-9061 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In WordPress before 4.7.5, a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilityexists when attempting to upload very large files, because the errormessage does not properly restrict presentation of the filename.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
